thread.title: Microsoft releases new update for Windows 10
thread.title_full: Microsoft releases new update for Windows 10 | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Microsoft releases new update for Windows 10
text:
Other Articles Not selling overseas properties: Sahara to Supreme Court Air India Express starts Varanasi-Sharjah flights Shadowfax raises angel fund from Snapdeal, Limeroad founders and Powai Lake Microsoft has released a new series of updates for Windows 10. According to the TechCrunch, the Microsoft Windows 10 update came with minimal documentation and explanation.
The Microsoft Windows 10 updated code comes with a set of notes.
This is third set of updates released by Microsoft after its launch in July.
Microsoft said that Windows 10 updates are cumulative. Therefore, this package contains all previously released fixes. If the users have previous updates installed, only the new fixes that are contained in this package will be downloaded and installed to their computer.
Microsoft is attempting to build Windows 10 as an operating system that can function on devices of any size or input variety.
 17, 2015 1:40 pm
